entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 10:47 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
